title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire on Wednesday, 22 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: news , sport , travel and weather updates resume on thursday at 08:00 .

documents.title: that all for live updates for northamptonshire today
text: we 've finished for today , but we will be back tomorrow with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for the county .
we 'll see you at 08:00 .
until then , have a good evening .

documents.title: eu referendum : mp says vote for leave can ease 'pressure on public services '
text: south northamptonshire mp andrea leadsom has been one of the key voices on the leave side of the campaign .
she has been involved in two of the big set-piece tv debates , including last night at wembley arena .

the conservative , who is an energy minister , said that in northamptonshire we have seen `` pressure on public services '' caused by eu migration , which can only be solved by leaving the european union .
she has also focused on sovereignty , telling the debate last night : `` we have this one last chance to keep our democracy . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu referendum : eu does n't 'impose ' laws , says mep
text: both sides in the eu debate are making their closing arguments on what is the final day of campaigning in the referendum .
glennis wilmott , a labour member of the european parliament representing northamptonshire , wants the uk to remain in the eu .
she said no laws are 'imposed ' on the uk from brussels .

mrs wilmott , also the leader of the labour group in the eu parliament , said `` both our parliament and our government have to agree '' before something becomes law , adding that involves `` negotiations and agreement '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: warning to avoid station close in daventry because of fire
text: around 30 firefighters are tackling a fire at a commercial premises in station close in daventry .
the fire service was called at 16:16 and they have pumps tackling the fire at the moment .
the blaze is ongoing and people are warned to avoid the area .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: azharullah takes all four wickets in first session at arundel
text: it 's tea at arundel and sussex are 127-4 , with all four wickets having fallen to mohammad azarullah .
you can follow the game with me online and via the bbc sport app .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: what will happen with the eu referendum vote tomorrow ?
text: tomorrow the country will go to the poles to vote in the eu referendum .
polling stations across the county will open at 07:00 and close at 10:00 .
then the counting begins .
each district and borough council will declare its result and send them on to kettering .
then we 'll have a result for northamptonshire , and for the east midlands .
that result will be sent to manchester , where the country-wide result will be collated .
as for when we 'll get some results , we are really not sure - but we 're guessing sometime between 02:00 and 06:00 on friday morning .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: refusal of wind farm upheld despite mps tearoom conversations
text: a decision to refuse permission to build five wind turbines in south northamptonshire has been upheld on appeal .
developers had said a conversation between the local mp and a government minister meant the decision should have been overturned .
back in 2013 , mp andrea leadsom opposed plans for five wind turbines between greatworth and helmdon .
a minister , kris hopkins , was due to make the planning decision , and ms leadsom told him of her opposition in the house of commons tearoom .
developers said this left mr hopkins open to accusations of bias .
today , appeal court judges said mr hopkins should have `` cut off '' the conversation - and that it was a breach of the ministerial code .
but they said it was `` impossible to conclude '' the conversation influenced the final decision - so the developers appeal was dismissed .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: milestone for northamptonshire in sussex match
text: play is underway at arundel in northamptonshire 's county championship match against sussex .
the match sees the county reach a huge milestone , with batsman sean terry becoming the 500th first-class cricketer to play for them .
northamptonshire are in the field , and you can follow full coverage with me online or via the bbc sport app .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: local paper catches up with 'razor ' at the football
text: let 's be honest england 's 0-0 draw with slovakia was n't that exciting , but for fans in the vicarage farm club in wellingborough it was slightly more interesting thanks to a visit from former liverpool , tottenham , west ham and england ( once ) defender neil 'razor ' ruddock .
you can see in him the club , and find out why he was there in the northampton chronicle & echo .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: eu vote : where does your mps stand ?
text: tomorrow , the polls opens for the eu referendum , where voters will decide with the county will leave or remain in the european union .
the bbc 's dedicated eu referendum website has a list of how all mps will be voting .
enter you postcode and all will be revealed .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: weather : rain and sunny spells
text: there is a lot of cloud across the county , as shown in this of roade taken by bbc weather watcher 'dugjay72 '
there will be outbreaks of rain today , but also some hazy sunshine with highs of 22c ( 72f ) .
more details can be found on the bbc weather website .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: drone used to carry out survey on 200-year-old aquaduct
text: for the first time the aqueduct in cosgrove is being surveyed by the canal & river trust - using a drone .
its progress was hampered this morning by rain , but the survey is now under way .
rain has finally cleared so the drone is now flying to inspect the iron trunk aqueduct at cosgrove @ twitterid
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: ducklings taking in 200-year-old iron trunk aqueduct
text: the canal & rivers trust is carrying out a survey of the 200-year-old iron trunk aqueduct , which runs along the grand union canal between northampton and milton keynes .
the trust is using a drone to carry out the work .
earlier today , things were pretty peaceful
waiting for the rain to stop at cosgrove so passing time watching these ducklings swim over the iron trunk aqueduct
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: man stabbed to death in northampton a 'very kind and loving person '
text: the family of david miller ( stabbed to death at his home in boothville last week , have called him `` a much loved brother '' who `` was permanently a very kind and loving person , generous to a fault '' .
mr miller , 56 , was found dead at his home address in patterdale walk , boothville , northampton in the early hours of tuesday , 14 june .
four people remain in custody having appeared last week at northampton crown court , charged with murder .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nhs in northamptonshire looking for apprentices
text: a recruitment drive is being held in northampton today to attract more apprentices to the nhs .
northamptonshire healthcare nhs foundation trust currently has several apprenticeship vacancies ranging from business administration to clinical positions .
the event starts at 16.30 and runs until 19.30 in newland house on campbell square , northampton .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cobblers have trip to barnsley in first round of football league cup
text: following the release of the football league fixtures this morning , the draw has been made in the first round of the newly revamped football league cup .
northampton town have been drawn away to championship side barnsley .
the tie will be played during the week starting 8 august .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: billy vunipola says dylan hartley is 'very inspirational '
text: northampton saints ' dylan hartley has also been praised for his england captaincy by one his side 's stand-out players , number eight billy vunipola .
vinipola said hartley `` always puts the team first '' and is `` very selfless '' .
vunipola , one of hartley 's vice-captains , said : `` he would never ask of us something he would n't do himself .
he is very inspirational , and a lot of boys follow him in that respect . ''
author: Chris Jones
BBC Radio 5 live rugby reporter in Australia

documents.title: hartley 'very good with the players ' says jones
text: dylan hartley has `` clearly done a good job leading england , '' according to his coach eddie jones .
jones said the saints hooker `` has got the ability to develop relationships with people - and therefore he would be a great candidate for the lions job '' .
`` he is very good with the players in making sure they understand standards we want in the team , and making sure they understand the values that are important , '' jones added .
author: Chris Jones
BBC Radio 5 live rugby reporter in Australia

documents.title: eddie jones : dylan hartley 'great candidate ' for 2017 lions captain
text: england coach eddie jones has backed dylan hartley for the role of lions captain in new zealand next year .
hartley has excelled as england skipper in 2016 , captaining the side to eight straight victories , including a grand slam and a series win in australia .
and jones feels the 30-year-old `` would be a great candidate '' to lead the lions against the all blacks .
author: Chris Jones
BBC Radio 5 live rugby reporter in Australia

documents.title: northamptonshire due to face sussex at arundel today
text: not a classic morning at one of the uk 's most wonderful cricket grounds , arundel castle .
northamptonshire are due to face sussex here in the county championship , but the forecast is n't great .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: dodging train fares : some without a train ticket have made a 'genuine mistake '
text: an independent watchdog , passenger focus , says some people without a train ticket have made a `` genuine mistake '' .
it comes after operator london midland said fare-dodgers are costing them nearly £ 7m a year in lost revenue
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: dodging train fares : 'there was too much of a queue '
text: people caught at euston without a ticket for london midland trains , which operate through northampton and long buckby , explained to be me yesterday why they did n't purchase one .
the company says fare-dodgers are costing them nearly £ 7m a year in lost revenue .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: train company losing nearly £ 7m a year from fare dodging
text: london midland , which operates trains from northampton and long buckby , says fare-dodgers are costing them nearly £ 7m a year in lost revenue .
yesterday , it carried out a major revenue recovery operation at euston station and 104 passengers were given penalties for having no tickets , or incorrect tickets .

but transport focus warns it is too easy for passengers to make unthinking mistakes with a ticketing system that is too complicated , and where it is n't always easy to find the correct fare information .
author: Mike Cartwright
BBC Look East

documents.title: weather : cloudy and rather humid with outbreaks of rain
text: it will be a mostly cloudy day with outbreaks of rain at times , although there will also be a few drier and brighter intervals , with some hazy sunshine and a high of 22c ( 72f ) .
my full forecast is below
there are more details on the bbc weather website .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: the football fixtures explained
text: if you 're confused by today 's talk about football fixtures , here is an alternative look from bbc comedian david mitchell
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton town will wait for wilder 's 'welcome ' back
text: while the cobbles will travel to bramall lane to face chris wilder 's sheffield united on news year 's eve , there is quite a wait to welcome him back to sixfields .
the manager who lead them to the league two title last season returns to northampton town on saturday , 8 april 2017 .
how he 's welcomed by the fans might depend on where the cobblers are in the table by then .
interestingly it was in northampton town 's fifth to last fixture of last season - the same fixture as the blades clash will be next season - that they won the league two title .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cobblers fans have some long tuesday night trips
text: the fixtures have n't been kind to northampton town fans hoping to be home early after some of the tuesday night fixtures .
their first tuesday night game is on 16 august , when they will have to travel to oldham , a 290 mile round trip .
they also have trips on a tuesday to swindon and bradford , but at least they play fleetwood on a saturday .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton town 's longest and shortest trips
text: northampton town 's longest and shortest trips

documents.title: new cobblers manager page wo n't face old side until december
text: new northampton town manager rob page will have to wait until the end of 2016 to face his former side , port vale .
the cobblers travel to vale park on saturday , 10 december .
they then host vale at sixfields on tuesday , 14 march 2017 .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: here are northampton town 's league one 2016/17 fixtures
text: here are northampton town 's league one 2016/17 fixtures

documents.title: northampton town start at home to fleetwood and meet wilder 's sheffield united on new years ' eve
text: the cobblers ' league 2 season starts at home - fleetwood town are the visitors on saturday 6 august .
that 's followed by a trip to charlton and a swift re-union with ricky holmes .
there are two very tasty fixtures over christmas - both away from home .
it 's oxford united on boxing day and then auld acquaintances are renewed with chris wilder at sheffield united on new year 's eve .

the derby matches against peterborough are away on tuesday , 18 october and at home on 19 november , while they host mk dons on saturday , 9 september and travel down the m1 on saturday , 21 january 2017 .
the season finishes on 30 april with a home match against gillingham .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: what fixtures will northampton town fans be looking out for ?
text: cobblers fans will be looking out for what their opening and closing fixtures will be , but also there are host of derbies coming up .
they 'll be facing their old foes peterborough in league but also their newest rivals mk dons , where the northampton took 7,000 away fans to in the fa cup last season
they 'll also be looking out for oxford united , after manager michael appleton said they were the best side in league two last season , despite finishing second to the cobblers .
also , the another fixture to look out for is the cobblers facing their league two winning manager chris wilder now at sheffield united .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: could this season possibly be as dramatic as the last for the cobblers ?
text: it 's unlikely anything could happen this season which would top the drama of last season .
there was the very real possibility the club could have gone out of business
but a takeover from kelvin thomas at the end of november secured the clubs future
and on the pitch there was an unbeaten run of 24 games which took them to the league two title
and an open top bus parade
maybe some fans will be hoping for less drama ?
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cobblers hoping for similar beginning and end of the season
text: last season begin for northampton town how it ended - with a win .
the first fixture of their league two championship season was away at bristol rovers , which they won 1-0 thanks to john-joe o'toole
the season concluded with a 2-1 win away at portsmouth thanks to a winner from jame collins
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: big day for the cobblers - welcome to football fixtures live
text: do n't worry sports-haters , we wo n't be doing this all day , but we 're starting today 's live feed with the announcement of the football league fixtures .
the full list will be revealed at 09:00 with northampton town on the brink of an exciting new journey in league one .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
